xx.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_DIFFICULTY_CONFIRM_TEXT: Changing the difficulty will restart the checkpoint. All your progress will be lost.
xx.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_LANGUAGE_CONFIRM_TEXT: The game needs to be restarted to apply the changes.
xx.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_GRAPHICS_GAMMA_HELP: Adjust the slider until the logo is barely visible
xx.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_GRAPHICS_RESTART_BODY: Some changes are not applied until the game is restarted.
xx.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_GRAPHICS_DISPLAY_MENU_C:
Do you want to keep these settings?
Reverting in [time] seconds.
xx.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_CONTROLS_LAYOUT_BUTTONM: This will reset all your mappings. Are you sure?

en.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_DIFFICULTY_CONFIRM_TEXT: Changing the difficulty will restart the checkpoint. All your progress will be lost.
en.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_LANGUAGE_CONFIRM_TEXT: The game needs to be restarted to apply the changes.
en.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_GRAPHICS_GAMMA_HELP: Adjust the slider until the logo is barely visible.
en.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_GRAPHICS_RESTART_BODY: Some changes are not applied until the game is restarted.
en.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_GRAPHICS_DISPLAY_MENU_C:
Do you want to keep these settings?
Reverting in [time] seconds.
en.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_CONTROLS_LAYOUT_BUTTONM: This will reset all your mappings. Are you sure?

fr.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_DIFFICULTY_CONFIRM_TEXT: Si vous modifiez la difficulté, vous recommencerez au dernier point de contrôle. Toute progression sera perdue.
fr.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_LANGUAGE_CONFIRM_TEXT: Le jeu doit redémarrer pour appliquer les modifications.
fr.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_GRAPHICS_GAMMA_HELP: Déplacez le curseur jusqu'à ce que le logo soit à peine visible.
fr.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_GRAPHICS_MENU_ITEM_SHOW: Afficher le radar pour les ennemis
fr.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_GRAPHICS_RESTART_BODY: Vous devez redémarrer le jeu pour que certains changements soient pris en compte.
fr.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_GRAPHICS_DISPLAY_MENU_C:
Voulez-vous garder ces paramètres ?
Retour aux paramètres précédents dans [time] secondes.
fr.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_CONTROLS_LAYOUT_BUTTONM: Ceci réinitialisera vos configurations de touches. Êtes-vous sûr(e) de vouloir continuer ?
fr.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_CONTROLLERLAYOUT_BUTTON: Armes de corps à corps & Explosifs
Armes automatiques, fusils à pompe & fusils de précision

it.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_DIFFICULTY_CONFIRM_TEXT: Cambiare la difficoltà resetterà il checkpoint. Tutti i progressi andranno perduti.
it.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_LANGUAGE_CONFIRM_TEXT: Il gioco deve essere riavviato per applicare le modifiche.
it.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_GRAPHICS_GAMMA_HELP: Regola il cursore fino a quando il logo risulta appena visibile.
it.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_GRAPHICS_RESTART_BODY: Alcuni cambiamenti non verranno applicati fino al riavvio del gioco.
it.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_GRAPHICS_DISPLAY_MENU_C:
Vuoi mantenere queste impostazioni?
Ripristino in [time] secondi.
it.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_CONTROLS_LAYOUT_BUTTONM: La configurazione dei tasti sarà reimpostata. Vuoi continuare?
it.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_CONTROLLERLAYOUT_BUTTON: Armi da corpo a corpo ed esplosivi
Armi automatiche, fucili e fucili di precisione

de.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_DIFFICULTY_CONFIRM_TEXT: Nach dem Ändern des Schwierigkeitsgrads wird der Kontrollpunkt neu gestartet. Ihr gesamter Fortschritt geht verloren.
de.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_LANGUAGE_CONFIRM_TEXT: Das Spiel muss neu gestartet werden, damit die Änderungen wirksam werden.
de.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_GRAPHICS_GAMMA_HELP: Verschieben Sie den Regler, bis das Logo gerade noch sichtbar ist.
de.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_GRAPHICS_RESTART_BODY: Einige Änderungen werden erst nach dem Neustart des Spiels wirksam.
de.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_GRAPHICS_DISPLAY_MENU_C:
Möchten Sie diese Einstellungen übernehmen?
Wiederherstellung der alten Einstellungen in [time] Sekunden.
de.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_CONTROLS_LAYOUT_BUTTONM: Dies wird Ihre Tastaturbelegung löschen. Sind Sie sicher?

es.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_DIFFICULTY_CONFIRM_TEXT: Si cambias la dificultad, volverás al punto de control y perderás todo tu progreso.
es.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_LANGUAGE_CONFIRM_TEXT: El juego debe reiniciarse para aplicar los cambios.
es.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_GRAPHICS_GAMMA_HELP: Ajusta el control deslizante hasta que el logotipo apenas sea visible.
es.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_GRAPHICS_RESTART_BODY: Algunos cambios no se aplican hasta que se reinicia el juego.
es.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_GRAPHICS_DISPLAY_MENU_C:
¿Quieres conservar estos ajustes?
Se restablecerán en [time] segundos.
es.EUI_TEXT_OPTIONS_CONTROLLERLAYOUT_BUTTON: Armas cuerpo a cuerpo y explosivos
Armas automáticas, escopetas y fusiles de francotirador
